creator: bbrand@freenet.de
text:
Adds a new attribute "initial-state" (expanded|collapsed) to fox:outline to 
specify if the PDF bookmark should be initially open or closed. It defaults to 
collapsed to be backwards compatible.

creator: bbrand@freenet.de
text:
Created attachment 7660
diff against fop-0.20.5 release

This functionality is available today in FOP 0.93 through the XSL 1.1
fo:bookmark formatting object with the "starting-state" property.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
